title: Diet may be a key factor for Influenza A virus exposure in wild African mammals

title_detail.value: Diet may be a key factor for Influenza A virus exposure in wild African mammals

summary: Given the importance and wide distribution of Influenza A viruses, it is surprising how little is known about infections of wild mammals. A new study sheds light on which species are commonly infected and why.

summary_detail.value: Given the importance and wide distribution of Influenza A viruses, it is surprising how little is known about infections of wild mammals. A new study sheds light on which species are commonly infected and why.
